column2: "Dɛm ntsi dɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn
column3: na sie n’ahwɛdodze

column2: "Na hom nhu ndɛ da yi: na mennkasa nnkyerɛ hom mba a wonnyim
column3: na wonnhun EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ntsea
column9: nye no ndwuma a ɔyɛe no wɔ Egypt tsiaa Egypthen Farao

column2: "nye dza ɔdze yɛɛ Egyptdɔm
column3: nye hɔn mpɔnkɔ
column4: nye hɔn ntseaseanam; mbrɛ ɔmaa Mbɛw Po nsu praam hɔn do aber a woritsiw hom
column5: na mbrɛ EWURADZE asɛɛ hɔn ebodu ndɛ da yi;"

column2: "nye dza ɔdze yɛɛ hom wɔ sar no do
column3: bodur dɛ hom baa bea yi do;"

column2: "na dza ɔdze yɛɛ Datan nye Abiram
column3: Reuben ne babanyin Eliab mbabanyin no; mbrɛ asaase buee n’ano
column7: nye enyikandze biara a odzii hɔn ekyir

column2: "na hom enyiwa ehu edwuma kɛse a EWURADZE yɛe no nyinara."
"Dɛm ntsi hom ndzi mbrasɛm a merehyɛ wo ndɛ da yi nyinara do
column3: na hom ho aayɛ dzen
column4: na hom aakɛfa asaase a hom rutwa mu akɔ do akɛfa no;"

column2: "na hom nda aawar wɔ asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom dɛ ɔdze bɛma hɔn na hɔn asefo no do
column3: asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do."

column2: "Na asaase no
column3: mbrɛ irutwa mu akɔ do akɛfa no
column7: na edze w’anan petse do nsu

column2: "na asaase no
column3: mbrɛ hom rutwa mu akɛfa no
column5: na ɔnom ɔsor nyankom mu nsu;"

column2: "asaase a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn hwɛ do; EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn n’enyiwa wɔ do dabaa
column3: ofi afe n’ahyɛse araa kodu afe n’ewiei."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: sɛ hom tsie me mbransɛm a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi yie
column4: dɛ hom dze hom akoma nyinara nye hom kra nyinara bɔdɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
column7: "ɔno mebɛma hom asaase do nsɔ atɔ wɔ n’aber mu

column2: "Na mebɛma wo haban mu aba nkyɛkyɛr ama wo fiembowa
column3: na eedzidzi amee."

column2: "Hom nhwɛ homho yie
column3: ma wɔanndaadaa hom akoma

column2: "na EWURADZE n’ebufuw aanndzɛw wɔ hom do
column3: na ɔaanntow ɔsor mu
column5: na asaase mma no ndɔbaa; na hom aannhera ntsɛmara wɔ asaase pa a EWURADZE dze rema hom no do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom mfa me nsɛm yi nsie hom akoma nye hom kra mu; na hom mfa nyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze mbɔ hom abaw do
column3: na ɔnyɛ nkaakyekyeree wɔ hom enyiwa ntamu."

column2: "Na hom mfa nkyerɛkyerɛ hom mba
column3: twetwe ho nkɔmbɔ aber a etse wo fie
column4: nye aber a enam ɔkwan mu

column2: "Na kyerɛw no wɔ wo fi mpondua ho
column3: na wo mbotsen ho:"

column2: "ama hom nda
column3: nye hom mba nda aadɔɔ so wɔ asaase a EWURADZE kaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ hom egyanom dɛ ɔdze bɛma hɔn no do
column4: dɛ ɔsor nda wɔ asaase do."

column2: "Na sɛ hom bɔdɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn
column3: hom anantsew n’akwan nyinara do
column4: na hom atakyer no ho a;"

column2: "ɔnodze EWURADZE botutu amanaman yi nyinara efi hom enyim
column3: na hom afa amanaman akɛse a wɔyɛ dzen sen homara."

column2: "Beebiara a hom anamɔn betsia no bɛyɛ homdze: ofi sar no do
column3: nye Lebanon
column4: ofi esutsen Eufrates ho ara kodu ekyirekyir epo no ho bɛyɛ hom he."

column2: "Nyimpa biara runntum nngyina hom enyim: EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze hom ho suro nye hom ho hu bogu asaase a hom betsia do nyinara do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka akyerɛ hom no."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: medze nhyira nye ndom mirisi hom enyim ndɛ da yi;"

column2: "nhyira no
column3: sɛ hom tsie EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mbransɛm a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi a;"

column2: "na ndom no
column3: sɛ hom enntsie EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mbransɛm
column4: na hom dan fi ɔkwan a merehyɛ hom ndɛ da yi do fa nkyɛn dɛ worikedzi enyame fofor a hom nnyim hɔn ekyir a."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ
column3: sɛ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze wo du asaase a erokɔ akɛfa no do a
column4: ibesi nhyira no wɔ bepɔw Gerizim do
column5: na ndom no wɔ bepɔw Ebal do."

column2: "Ana wonnyi Jordan egya
column3: witɔree kwan no ekyir
column4: wɔ Keenanfo a wɔtse Araba do no asaase do
column6: wɔ More nsudur ho bi a?"

column2: "Na hom rubotwa Jordan akɔ akɛfa asaase a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze rema hom no
column3: na hom bɛfa

column2: "Na hom ndwen do nyɛ ahyɛdze nye atsɛmbu a medze mirisi hom enyim ndɛ da yi nyinara."
